round_1: ^I'm happy to meet you, I hope we'll be able to spend time together!
^It gets a bit dull here, I hope you can take me out for a spin!
^Do you spend a lot of time outside?

c-0: ^I do, there are a lot of paths you can walk around, would love to take you along one day!
c-1: ^I like to play football in Horsham park, it's great on sunny days!
^That sounds fun! Would love to see that!
c-2: ^When the weather allows it I like to read a book outside in my garden
c-3: ^Not really, I prefer staying home and watch movies most of the time

round_2: ^Nice to see you in person! And right on time!
^Have you talked with the owner before coming here though? Wouldn't want to get on their wrong side..

c-0: ^Yes I had to take a reservation online before coming here don't worry
g-0: ^Ah nice! Well, it's good to know that
^It's nice that you think about coming here and visit.
^Don't get me wrong, I love my friends here, but they're a bit too rowdy for my taste and don't have a lot of interesting things to say!
^What kind of people do you know and hang around with at home?

c-1: ^I love to organize these barbeque parties at home and I have all sorts of friends coming. It's great fun and I'm sure we can share the food too!
^This sounds amazing! I can already imagine the smell of the grilled sausages!
c-2: ^ Yes! We have a lot of children in our home of all ages, and I'm sure you will be able to find yourself friends among them!
^Children? Aren't they like small humans that don't listen to any rules and keep breaking stuff all the time? Huh..
c-3: ^We often meet with these friends of ours who have their own dogs. It's always great fun and you'll see you'll love playing with them too!
^Other dogs? And they play with each other at any time? That's amazing!
c-4: ^I usually prefer staying home and watch some TV after work. There are some great shows on display and this series I love to watch..

round_3: ^So nice to be outside of the shelter and see all these people!
^I even helped someone cross the street, they were very thankful!
^But others were crossing when the light was still red, not good!
^Especially some of the cats here, they keep lying in places where they aren't allowed, but people keep feeding them too, I don't understand..

c-0: ^Cats don't listen to any rule unfortunately, which is why I much prefer dogs!
^We at least listen to you guys!
c-1: ^Cats don't listen to any rule unfortunately, but that is the way they are, you should respect them!
c-2: ^You know, rules are there just as an indication, and sometimes even to be broken. You don't have to obey them alll the time, it's fine.
c-3: ^That's very nice of you to help elderly people cross the street. If everyone did that it would be even nicer here
^If I didn't help that person, who would? I had to!
